title: QuotationSideEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the side from which perspective a value is quoted.

oneOf.title: Afternoon
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Afternoon fixing reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Ask
oneOf.description: Denotes a value 'asked' by a seller for an asset, i.e. the value at which a seller is willing to sell.

oneOf.title: Bid
oneOf.description: Denotes a value 'bid' by a buyer for an asset, i.e. the value a buyer is willing to pay.

oneOf.title: Closing
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Closing price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: High
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the High price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Index
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Index price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: LocationalMarginal
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Locational Marginal price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Low
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Low price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: MarginalHourly
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Marginal Hourly price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: MarketClearing
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Market Clearing price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: MeanOfBidAndAsk
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Average of the Bid and Ask prices reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: MeanOfHighAndLow
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Average of the High and Low prices reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Mid
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Average of the Midpoint of prices reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Morning
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Morning fixing reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: NationalSingle
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the National Single price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: OSP
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Official Settlement Price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Official
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Official price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Opening
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Opening price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Settlement
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Settlement price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Spot
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Spot price reported in or by the relevant Price Source as specified in the relevant Confirmation.

oneOf.title: UnWeightedAverage
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Non-volume Weighted Average of prices effective on the Pricing Date.

oneOf.title: WeightedAverage
oneOf.description: Denotes a value as the Volume Weighted Average of prices effective on the Pricing Date.
